trans-unit.source: Represents a <see langword="catch" /> exception block of a <see langword="try/catch" /> statement.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see langword="catch" /> 语句的 <see langword="try/catch" /> 异常块。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause> can be used to represent a `catch` exception block of a `try/catch` statement.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause> 用于表示`catch`异常块的`try/catch`语句。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause.CatchExceptionType%2A> property specifies the type of exception to catch.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause.CatchExceptionType%2A>属性指定要捕获的异常的类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause.LocalName%2A> property specifies a name for the variable representing the exception that has been caught.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause.LocalName%2A>属性指定表示已捕捉到异常的变量的名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause.Statements%2A> collection property contains the statements for the `catch` block.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause.Statements%2A>集合属性包含的语句`catch`块。

trans-unit.source: The following example code demonstrates using <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause> objects to define exception handling clauses of a try...catch block.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause>对象，以定义异常处理子句的 try … catch 块。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The name of the local variable declared in the catch clause for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 在异常的 catch 子句中声明的局部变量的名称。

trans-unit.source: This is optional.
trans-unit.target: 这是可选项。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause" /> class using the specified local variable name for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用异常的指定局部变量名初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The name of the local variable declared in the catch clause for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 在异常的 catch 子句中声明的局部变量的名称。

trans-unit.source: This is optional.
trans-unit.target: 这是可选项。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference" /> that indicates the type of exception to catch.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference" />，指示要捕捉的异常的类型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause" /> class using the specified local variable name for the exception and exception type.
trans-unit.target: 使用异常的指定局部变量名和异常类型初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The name of the local variable declared in the catch clause for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 在异常的 catch 子句中声明的局部变量的名称。

trans-unit.source: This is optional.
trans-unit.target: 这是可选项。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference" /> that indicates the type of exception to catch.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference" />，指示要捕捉的异常的类型。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatement" /> objects that represent the contents of the catch block.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatement" /> 对象的数组，表示 catch 块的内容。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause" /> class using the specified local variable name for the exception, exception type and statement collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用异常的指定局部变量名、异常类型和语句集合初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of the exception to handle with the catch block.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置处理 catch 块的异常的类型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference" /> that indicates the type of the exception to handle.
trans-unit.target: 指示要处理的异常类型的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference" />。

trans-unit.source: If a value for this property is not specified, the value of this property defaults to <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此属性的值，此属性的值默认为<xref:System.Exception>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the variable name of the exception that the <see langword="catch" /> clause handles.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see langword="catch" /> 子句处理的异常的变量名称。

trans-unit.source: The name for the exception variable that the <see langword="catch" /> clause handles.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="catch" /> 子句处理的异常变量的名称。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the name of the local variable for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定异常本地变量的名称。

trans-unit.source: This local variable is optional.
trans-unit.target: 此本地变量是可选的。

trans-unit.source: By default, the clause does not have this variable.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，该子句不具有此变量。

trans-unit.source: Gets the statements within the catch block.
trans-unit.target: 获取 catch 块中的语句。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection" /> containing the statements within the catch block.
trans-unit.target: 包含 catch 块中语句的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection" />。
